mapper.select: SELECT status FROM t_model WHERE source = #{source} AND market_code = #{marketCode}
SELECT tm.index ,tm.article, tm.counter, tm.mine FROM t_model tm WHERE source = #{source} AND market_code = #{marketCode}
SELECT tm.index, tm.article, tm.counter, tm.mine, tm.status FROM t_model tm WHERE source = #{source} AND market_code = #{marketCode}
